title: From The SMALLEST To The LARGEST - The Ultimate Size Comparison
description:
This video was sponsored by GiveWell. 
First-time donors will have their donation matched up to $100 at https://www.givewell.org/Kurzgesagt

Sources & further reading: https://sites.google.com/view/sources-middle-of-scale/

You are in the middle of everything in the Universe.
Let us go on a fantastical journey together  - to the impossibly small and the incomprehensibly large!
